content: this crochet pattern will help you create a cute axolotl appliqué with moving hands and arms the axolotl crochet pattern is easy to intermediate skill level and is made in just 2 pieces and apart from sewing those pieces together there is no other sewing involved the axolotl appliqués can be sewn onto almost any of your crochet creations to give them a cute axolotl theme making great gift ideas for gaming fans and kids the appliqué measures 11cm x 14cm supplies you will need crochet hook - 4mm sewing needle aran / worsted / #4 yarn - 29 yards scissors - 8mm safety eyes recommend skill level is intermediate the pattern is written in usa terminology you will need to know basic crochet stitches plus the popcorn instructions for popcorn are included you ll also need to know how to work into a magic_ring increase and decrease the pattern is 5 pages long and includes progress photos this pattern has been thoroughly tested a free basic version of this crochet pattern is available on https //hookfully com/
